abstract.summary: The Mothership OS is a business operating system designed to synchronize a legal entity with its digital state (Living Digital Twin). The system utilizes the Relational Accountability Model (RAM) to govern Human-AI interactions through a deterministic, five-layer (L0–L4) hierarchy. Unlike internal model alignment strategies (Constitutional AI), the Mothership OS enforces governance through external ConstraintSets and AgentContracts computed at runtime.

core_claims.title: Relational vs. Constitutional
core_claims.description: Governance is defined by relational bonds and mutual obligations rather than abstract model moralities.

core_claims.title: Clinical Sovereignty
core_claims.description: Technical enforcement via the Sentinel Protocol ensures time/place latching for every agent action.

core_claims.title: Forensic Learning
core_claims.description: A closed-loop RLHF system (Daedalus) transforms human decisions into operational patterns.

sovereign_bond_stack.description: The Sovereign Bond Stack is the mechanical implementation of RAM, defining the flow of authority, obligation, and liability between nodes.

foundational_bonds.name: Founder ↔ Organization
foundational_bonds.label: Primary Authority Latch
foundational_bonds.description: The Founder retains the Burden of Intent; the Organization carries the Burden of Context.

foundational_bonds.name: Founder ↔ Stewards (Elders)
foundational_bonds.label: Delegated Tactical Authority
foundational_bonds.description: Elders interpret mission lines within specific domains with a technical mandate for risk escalation.

foundational_bonds.name: Senior ↔ Junior
foundational_bonds.label: Supervisory Liability
foundational_bonds.description: Higher-tier nodes are accountable for lower-tier outputs via PROCEED/VETO validation loops.

foundational_bonds.name: Peer ↔ Peer
foundational_bonds.label: Horizontal Synchronization
foundational_bonds.description: Agents of the same tier coordinate via compatible ConstraintSets to prevent domain collision.

foundational_bonds.name: All ↔ Source of Truth
foundational_bonds.label: Forensic Anchor
foundational_bonds.description: All system states must align with audited external data (Ledgers, Statutes, Forensic Evidence).

rbaa.name: Role-Based Agent Authority (RBAA)
rbaa.description: RBAA is the permissions substrate that translates RAM bonds into concrete data and action scopes.

properties.name: Spatial-Latched
properties.description: Every decision is validated against Harbor, Tenant, and Jurisdiction.

properties.name: Temporal-Latched
properties.description: Decisions are tied to a mission sequence and timestamp, preventing context-blind drift.

sentinel_protocol.description: The Sentinel Protocol is the technical law engine of the Mothership OS. It governs how work is authorized and routed within the corporate sovereign.

constraint_sets.name: ConstraintSets
constraint_sets.description: Computed constraints that define permissible behavior and scope for agents at runtime.

agent_contracts.name: AgentContracts
agent_contracts.description: Contracts that bind specific roles to finite scopes such as collections, APIs, and allowedActions.

governance_sessions.name: GovernanceSessions
governance_sessions.description: Structured logs where every significant action is recorded for governance and audit.

external_constraint_enforcement.description: By keeping constraints external to model weights, Sentinel eliminates the opacity of vendor-unilateralism.
principles: Governance structure lives outside any single model.
Constraints are only amendable via formal KONTROL changes approved by Overwatch.

intelligence_substrate.description: Intelligence substrate components that support governance, learning, and advisory behavior.

library.name: The Library
library.description: Authoritative knowledgebase substrate for proven patterns. It does not compute constraints but provides shared memory for L3/L4 agents.

daedalus.name: Daedalus RLHF
daedalus.description: Monitors GovernanceSessions for human PROCEED/VETO signals and converts interaction pairs into curated training data for model fine-tuning and pattern curation.

icarus.name: ICARUS Advisory
icarus.description: Tenant-scoped copilot with read-only governance access. Explains constraints to the human owner and shapes mission briefs for the build pipelines.

qfd_modules.name: QFD Strategic Modules
qfd_modules.description: Utilizes Quality Function Deployment to map the "Voice of the Human" to technical behavior, ensuring capabilities are driven by real-world SME requirements.

architecture.description: Operational structure of the Mothership OS across a five-layer hierarchical stack.

layers.name: THE FIRM
layers.role: Organizational root mapping core legal roles and the sovereign root.

layers.name: COMMAND PLANE
layers.role: Human intent layer where THE OVERWATCH establishes strategic lines.

layers.name: THE ELDERS
layers.role: Strategic intelligence and governance design (Sentinel, Architect, Engineer).

layers.name: THE WORKSHOP
layers.role: Operational substrate for execution and learning (Labs, Forge, Daedalus).

layers.name: SPECIALIST INSTANCES
layers.role: Tenant-facing surfaces and industry-specific agents (MYAUDIT, VERIFY).
